Articles.Content:
You have 20 seconds after reading this to come up with an Epic Chase Scene, from scratch! KGO!

Example form: X in [Vehicle] chasing Y in [Vehicle] (But you need not stick to that! be imaginative!)

(For example, [and this COUNTS as the question was sprung on me by a friend] The Joker in Bowsers' Kart chasing Angelina Jolie on a Penny Farthing.)

You can be simple or elaborate, just get going!

(Bonus points if you include a drawing or photoshop a picture to go with it, no matter how horrible it is)
Jeb on an ICBM chasing Bill on an SSTO

Well played.

Well, I'm starting to think this thread is a dud.
Thomas Jefferson chasing himself from 5 years in the future through Area 51, both of them flying the Millennium Falcon.

Albert Einstein flying NX-01 Enterprise away from David Cameron in a Vauxhall Astra diesel.

Or, for even more awesome, the other way round.
Bananaman flying a giant milk carton chasing Obama in a sidecar.
A distraction of moronic seagulls following an Ice cream truck
An armarda of leaf-cutter ants pursuing Hammond in a desperate attempt to cart him away to their lair.
An army of dinosaurs with laser cannons driving Ferrari's chasing a tree with legs in a plane.
